attributes.action: limit the payment of child related benefits to a maximum of two children per family on the basis that financial responsibility for children should rest with the parent and not the state
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: there should  not be a financial incentive  to have children .Obviosly this would not be a retrospective action but one designed to make people think twice about bringing children into the world when they have no means to support them financially.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "limit the payment of child related benefits to a maximum of two children per family on the basis that financial responsibility for children should rest with the parent and not the state."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15241.asp

Prime Minister's Office
